title: The "Chandrika" Polki Diamond Pendant
features: This exquisite pendant showcases the timeless beauty of Polki diamonds. The central, uniquely shaped Polki diamond is the centerpiece, surrounded by a delicate latticework of smaller Polkis. The top features a floral motif also set with polkis. The entire piece is handcrafted using traditional Kundan setting techniques, known for their intricate detail and enduring craftsmanship. Features Hyderabadi Polish, a signature of fine jewelry from the region.
colors: Gold and White. The golden hue of the 22K gold perfectly complements the white
occasions: and grand receptions. Can also be paired with modern attire for a touch of regal elegance.
description: A stunning heirloom piece, handcrafted with traditional techniques, featuring ethically sourced Polki diamonds. The timeless design and superior craftsmanship make this pendant a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. The 'Chandrika' Polki Pendant represents the epitome of South Indian heritage combined with modern aesthetic appeal.
